name: Wallrun Dot Love
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 30 by leafo and i.i

Wall running and ledge grabbing are commonplace in this action platformer created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 30. Take your dagger and destroy some evil looking minions while listening to the rockin' soundtrack. Experience the advanced AI of the 4 distinct enemies as you navigate through the three levels.

View the Ludum Dare submission page.

Thanks for playing!
